definition: northern mountain/refers to Mt Mang 邙山 at Luoyang in Henan
north/(classical) to be defeated
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The volcanics in the Beishan area, consisting mainly of lava and tuff, are well developed and linearly distributed.
sentences.chinese: 北山地區火山岩發育，以熔岩和凝灰岩爲主。

sentences.english: Jinwozi Gold Deposit lies in the mid ore-forming band of Beishan Belt, Gansu Province.
sentences.chinese: 金窩子金礦牀爲於甘肅北山中成礦帶。

sentences.english: Groundwater formation and distribution in the preselected Beishan area for the geologic disposal of high level radioactive waste are presented in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述北山地區不同類型地下水的形成和賦存規律。
